title: Tech News: Jony Ive and Apple Part Ways
itunes:title: Tech News: Jony Ive and Apple Part Ways
description:
Apple and Jony Ive's design company have chosen not to extend a contract, meaning for the first time in 30 years Apple will be without Ive's influence in design. Also, more than 500 women sue Uber over the violence they experienced from drivers. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Apple and Jony Ive's design company have chosen not to extend a contract, meaning for the first time in 30 years Apple will be without Ive's influence in design. Also, more than 500 women sue Uber over the violence they experienced from drivers.

itunes:keywords: Apple, Jony Ive, LoveFrom, Tesla, Elon Musk, Twitter, SpaceX, Amazon, Ring, surveillance, Nintendo, computer science, education, TikTok, CIA, data leak, Joshua Schulte, Uber
